comment: This class was super easy yet informative. It was mostly discussion posts that were completion grades. The main grade is the immigrants essay that was definitely graded harder but the feedback helped a lot. Youll definitely end with an A. I would take it again

i really enjoyed having professor wilson this semester for american identities. his class was super easy and informative. main grades were the midterm, final, and immigration essay which were all writing assignments. it was a very interesting class with a discussion weekly & informative topics. no lockdown browser. would take again!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class--Graded by few things
